16 ReconstructionFirstOrder<Tx, Tad>::ReconstructionFirstOrder(const size_t val_ni, const size_t val_nj): Reconstruction<Tx, Tad>(){
17  ni = val_ni;
18  nj = val_nj;
19  nic = ni - 1;
20  njc = nj - 1;
21 };
28 template<class Tx, class Tad>
29 void ReconstructionFirstOrder<Tx, Tad>::evaluate_chi(const Array2D<const Tad>& q, Array2D<Tad>& ql, Array2D<Tad>& qr){
30 #pragma omp parallel for
31  for(size_t i=0; i<ni; i++){
32  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
33  ql[i][j] = q[i][j+1];
34  qr[i][j] = q[i+1][j+1];
35  }
36  }
37 };
38 
39 template<class Tx, class Tad>
40 void ReconstructionFirstOrder<Tx, Tad>::evaluate_eta(const Array2D<const Tad>& q, Array2D<Tad>& ql, Array2D<Tad>& qr){
41 #pragma omp parallel for
42  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
43  for(size_t j=0; j<nj; j++){
44  ql[i][j] = q[i+1][j];
45  qr[i][j] = q[i+1][j+1];
46  }
47  }
48 };

55 template<class Tx, class Tad>
56 ReconstructionSecondOrder<Tx, Tad>::ReconstructionSecondOrder(const size_t val_ni, const size_t val_nj): Reconstruction<Tx, Tad>(){
57  ni = val_ni;
58  nj = val_nj;
59  nic = ni - 1;
60  njc = nj - 1;
61 
62  eps_chi = pow(10.0/nic, 3);
63  eps_eta = pow(10.0/njc, 3);
64 
65  f2_chi = Array2D<Tad>(ni, njc);
66  a1_chi = Array2D<Tad>(nic, njc);
67  a2_chi = Array2D<Tad>(nic, njc);
68  f3qt_chi = Array2D<Tad>(nic, njc);
69 
70 
71  f2_eta = Array2D<Tad>(nic, nj);
72  a1_eta = Array2D<Tad>(nic, njc);
73  a2_eta = Array2D<Tad>(nic, njc);
74  f3qt_eta = Array2D<Tad>(nic, njc);
75 
76 };
77 template<class Tx, class Tad>
78 void ReconstructionSecondOrder<Tx, Tad>::evaluate_chi(const Array2D<const Tad>& q, Array2D<Tad>& ql, Array2D<Tad>& qr){
79  auto f2 = f2_chi;
80  auto a1 = a1_chi;
81  auto a2 = a2_chi;
82  auto f3qt = f3qt_chi;
83  auto eps = eps_chi;
84 #pragma omp parallel for
85  for(size_t i=0; i<ni; i++){
86  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
87  ql[i][j] = q[i][j+1];
88  qr[i][j] = q[i+1][j+1];
89  }
90  }
91 #pragma omp parallel for
92  for(size_t i=0; i<ni; i++){
93  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
94  f2[i][j] = q[i+1][j+1] - q[i][j+1];
95  }
96  }
97 
98 #pragma omp parallel for
99  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
100  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
101  a1[i][j] = 3.0*f2[i+1][j]*f2[i][j];
102  a2[i][j] = 2.0*(f2[i+1][j] - f2[i][j])*(f2[i+1][j] - f2[i][j]) + a1[i][j];
103  f3qt[i][j] = 0.25*(a1[i][j] + eps)/(a2[i][j] + eps);
104  }
105  }
106 
107 #pragma omp parallel for
108  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
109  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
110  ql[i+1][j] = ql[i+1][j] + f3qt[i][j]*(thm*f2[i][j] + thp*f2[i+1][j]);
111  qr[i][j] = qr[i][j] - f3qt[i][j]*(thp*f2[i][j] + thm*f2[i+1][j]);
112  }
113  }
114 };
115 
116 template<class Tx, class Tad>
117 void ReconstructionSecondOrder<Tx, Tad>::evaluate_eta(const Array2D<const Tad>& q, Array2D<Tad>& ql, Array2D<Tad>& qr){
118  auto f2 = f2_eta;
119  auto a1 = a1_eta;
120  auto a2 = a2_eta;
121  auto f3qt = f3qt_eta;
122  auto eps = eps_eta;
123 #pragma omp parallel for
124  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
125  for(size_t j=0; j<nj; j++){
126  ql[i][j] = q[i+1][j];
127  qr[i][j] = q[i+1][j+1];
128  }
129  }
130 #pragma omp parallel for
131  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
132  for(size_t j=0; j<nj; j++){
133  f2[i][j] = q[i+1][j+1] - q[i+1][j];
134  }
135  }
136 
137 #pragma omp parallel for
138  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
139  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
140  a1[i][j] = 3.0*f2[i][j+1]*f2[i][j];
141  a2[i][j] = 2.0*(f2[i][j+1] - f2[i][j])*(f2[i][j+1] - f2[i][j]) + a1[i][j];
142  f3qt[i][j] = 0.25*(a1[i][j] + eps)/(a2[i][j] + eps);
143  }
144  }
145 
146 #pragma omp parallel for
147  for(size_t i=0; i<nic; i++){
148  for(size_t j=0; j<njc; j++){
149  ql[i][j+1] = ql[i][j+1] + f3qt[i][j]*(thm*f2[i][j] + thp*f2[i][j+1]);
150  qr[i][j] = qr[i][j] - f3qt[i][j]*(thp*f2[i][j] + thm*f2[i][j+1]);
151  }
152  }
153 
154 };
